properties.areaDesc: S of Cape Lookout NC to Surf City NC out to 20 nm; S of Ocracoke Inlet NC to Cape Lookout NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 5 at 11:10AM EST until January 5 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...STRONG WINDS AND HAZARDOUS SEAS GRADUALLY DIMINISH TODAY...

.Conditions will gradually improve today into this evening with
diminishing winds and subsiding seas as high pressure builds in
from the west.

* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 4 to 7 feet.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Cape Lookout to Surf City.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
